articles.description: Arne Slot praises the return of Mohamed Salah, with Liverpool's Champions League win in Marseille proving important for both.
articles.title: Champions League: Arne Slot praises Mohamed Salah return on important night for both

articles.description: Fermin Lopez scores twice as Barcelona beat Slavia Prague to boost their chances of moving straight into the last 16 of the Champions League.
articles.title: Slavia Prague 2-4 Barcelona: Fermin Lopez double helps Barca win in Champions League

articles.description: Eddie Howe says Yoane Wissa came to Newcastle "for these nights" after his first Champions League goal at St James' Park.
articles.title: Newcastle v PSV Eindhoven: Yoane Wissa inspires after 'coming for these nights'

articles.description: Chelsea beat Champions League minnows Pafos to keep their hopes alive of finishing in the top eight - but it takes 77 minutes to break down the Cypriot side through Moises Caicedo's diving header.
articles.title: Chelsea 1-0 Pafos: Moises Caicedo spares Chelsea blushes against minnows Pafos

articles.description: Harry Kane scores twice and misses a penalty as 10-man Bayern Munich secure their place in the last 16 of the Champions League with a comfortable victory over Union Saint-Gilloise.
articles.title: Champions League: Harry Kane scores twice as Bayern move into last 16

articles.description: With the league phase of Champions League almost at its conclusion, which teams can join Arsenal and Bayern Munich in the top eight?
articles.title: Champions League: Which clubs can still make the top eight and qualify for the knockouts?

articles.description: Why Brendon McCullum must heed his own advice as England's post-Ashes era begins with a white-ball series in Sri Lanka.
articles.title: Brendon McCullum's future under scrutiny as England prepare for white-ball series in Sri Lanka

articles.description: Liverpool become the top-earning Premier League club for the first time, according to analysis from financial firm Deloitte.
articles.title: Liverpool top English club in Deloitte Money League for first time

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Juventus vs Benfica in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Juventus vs Benfica: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Former England captain Jamie George is to retire at the end of 2027 after agreeing a one-year contract extension with Saracens.
articles.title: Jamie George: Former England captain to retire at end of 2026-27
